question: Akkitham Achuthan Namboothiri, who has been chosen for the 55th Jnanpith Award, is associated to which language?
explanation: Eminent Malayalam poet Akkitham Achuthan Namboothiri has been chosen as the recipient of the 55th Jnanpith Award for the year 2019. Born in 1926, Akkitham is one of the most revered names in Malayalam poetry. Apart from poetry, his literary excellence has footprints in genres like drama, reminiscence, critical essays, children literature, short stories and translation. He has authored 55 books out of which 45 are collections of poems including \"Khanda Kavyas\", \"Katha Kavyas\", \"Charitha Kavyas\" and songs. His works have also been translated into many Indian and foreign languages.
